description:
A custom launcher for Minecraft that allows you to easily manage multiple installations of Minecraft at once


Hi again! And this time much sooner :)
This is a small release meant to address some of the initial bugs that were reported in 10.0.0, including a fake .index Shader Pack appearing in-game and issues with updating on Linux.
Changelog
See here for the full list of changes.
Added
- Use "Game" category on macOS by @dkaluta in #4619
Changed
- Automatically use vcpkg to build on macOS and Windows by @getchoo in #4670
- Hardcode less Prism Launcher branding by @Octol1ttle in #4648
- Use libarchive to extract updates by @Trial97 in #4641
Fixed
- Don't use .index for shaderpacks by @TheKodeToad in #4658
- Fix update manifest generation for Linux by @Trial97 in #4649
- Fix AppImage zsync information by @getchoo in #4671
